comment:
Represents a Document in a CouchDatabase 
 
Creation - Use the CouchDatabase.CreateDocument() method. 
Retrieval - Use the CouchDatabase.GetDocumentByID() method 
Deletion - Use the CouchDatabase.DeleteDocument() method
codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created database As CouchDatabase object 
 
Dim document As CouchDocument 
 
Set document = database.createDocument(&quot;myUniqueID&quot;)
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Represents a Document in a CouchDatabase <br /> <br />Creation - Use the CouchDatabase.CreateDocument() method. <br />Retrieval - Use the CouchDatabase.GetDocumentByID() method <br />Deletion - Use the CouchDatabase.DeleteDocument() method </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Represents a Document in a CouchDatabase <br /> <br />Creation - Use the CouchDatabase.CreateDocument() method. <br />Retrieval - Use the CouchDatabase.GetDocumentByID() method <br />Deletion - Use the CouchDatabase.DeleteDocument() method
inlinecomment:
' Represents a Document in a CouchDatabase 
 
Creation - Use the CouchDatabase.CreateDocument() method. 
Retrieval - Use the CouchDatabase.GetDocumentByID() method 
Deletion - Use the CouchDatabase.DeleteDocument() method
codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created database As CouchDatabase object <br /> <br />Dim document As CouchDocument <br /> <br />Set document = database.createDocument(&quot;myUniqueID&quot;)

methods.label: AddItem
methods.comment:
Adds an Item to the CouchDocument   
Returns a flag indicating success / failure of the operation.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Call document.AddItem(|foo|, |bar|)  
&apos; adds an item named &quot;foo&quot; with the value of &quot;bar&quot; to the CouchDocument object.
methods.signature: Function AddItem(ItemName As String, Value As Variant) As Boolean
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Adds an Item to the CouchDocument   <br />Returns a flag indicating success / failure of the operation. </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Adds an Item to the CouchDocument   <br />Returns a flag indicating success / failure of the operation.
methods.inlinecomment:
' Adds an Item to the CouchDocument   
Returns a flag indicating success / failure of the operation.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br /> <br />Call document.AddItem(|foo|, |bar|)  <br />&apos; adds an item named &quot;foo&quot; with the value of &quot;bar&quot; to the CouchDocument object.

methods.label: AddItemToJSONObject
methods.comment: Adds an item to an existing JSON Object of a CouchDocument
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created server as CouchServer and database as CouchDatabase objects.
  
Dim document As CouchDocument 
Dim id As String 
Dim json As String 
 
id = server.getUUID() &apos; For this example, assume server.getUUID() returned &quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d3010b41&quot;
json = |{
		&quot;recipe&quot;: {
			&quot;name&quot;: &quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;,
			&quot;PrepTime&quot;: 15,
			&quot;CookTime&quot;: 5,
			&quot;Servings&quot;: 4,
			&quot;Difficulty&quot;: &quot;&quot;,
			&quot;Ingredients&quot;: [
				&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,
				&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,
				&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,
				&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,
				&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;
			],
			&quot;Directions&quot;: [
				&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,
				&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,
				&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,
				&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;
			]
		}
	}|
 
Print |Create a recipe document|
Set document = database.createDocument(id, json) 
Call document.Save() 
Print document.JSONValue
Print || 
 
%REM Prints
Create a recipe document
{&quot;$$Meta$$&quot;:{&quot;$LastModified&quot;:&quot;2023-09-23T14:20:39Z&quot;},&quot;_id&quot;:&quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d3010b41&quot;,&quot;_rev&quot;:&quot;1-4eb3af862a6d2c6b2e0d1ca848a99db2&quot;,&quot;recipe&quot;:{&quot;CookTime&quot;:5,&quot;Difficulty&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;Directions&quot;:[&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;],&quot;Ingredients&quot;:[&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;],&quot;PrepTime&quot;:15,&quot;Servings&quot;:4,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;}}
 
%END REM 
  
  
Call document.AddItemToJsonObject(|Calories|, |recipe|, 45)
Call document.Save() 
Print |Added Calories item to recipe and saved the document|
Print document.JSONValue 
Print ||
%REM Prints 
Added Calories item to recipe and saved the document
{&quot;$$Meta$$&quot;:{&quot;$LastModified&quot;:&quot;2023-09-23T14:20:41Z&quot;},&quot;_id&quot;:&quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d3010b41&quot;,&quot;_rev&quot;:&quot;2-1880b4b12b7b6bdaad9d44b222f7dd10&quot;,&quot;recipe&quot;:{&quot;Calories&quot;:45,&quot;CookTime&quot;:5,&quot;Difficulty&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;Directions&quot;:[&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;],&quot;Ingredients&quot;:[&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;],&quot;PrepTime&quot;:15,&quot;Servings&quot;:4,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;}}
 
%END REM

methods.label: AddJSONObject
methods.comment: Adds a JSON Object to a CouchDocument
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created server as CouchServer and database as CouchDatabase objects.
   
Dim document As CouchDocument 
Dim id As String 
Dim json As String 
 
id = server.getUUID() &apos; For this example, assume server.getUUID() returned &quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d30122c6&quot;
Set document = database.createDocument(id) 
Print |Create a document|
Call document.Save() 
Print |Document JSON: | &amp; document.JSONValue
Print || 
%REM Prints 
Create a document
Document JSON: 
 
%END REM 
 
 
json = |{
		&quot;recipe&quot;: {
			&quot;name&quot;: &quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;,
			&quot;PrepTime&quot;: 15,
			&quot;CookTime&quot;: 5,
			&quot;Servings&quot;: 4,
			&quot;Difficulty&quot;: &quot;&quot;,
			&quot;Ingredients&quot;: [
				&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,
				&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,
				&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,
				&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,
				&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;
			],
			&quot;Directions&quot;: [
				&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,
				&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,
				&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,
				&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;
			]
		}
	}|
  
Call document.AddJSONObject(json)
Call document.Save() 
Print |Added recipe json and saved the document|
Print |Document JSON: | &amp; document.JSONValue
Print ||
%REM Prints 
Added recipe json and saved the document
Document JSON: {&quot;$$Meta$$&quot;:{&quot;$LastModified&quot;:&quot;2023-09-23T14:38:12Z&quot;},&quot;_id&quot;:&quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d30122c6&quot;,&quot;_rev&quot;:&quot;1-345469118a318279fcb13c1ec2ea3bb8&quot;,&quot;recipe&quot;:{&quot;CookTime&quot;:5,&quot;Difficulty&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;Directions&quot;:[&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;],&quot;Ingredients&quot;:[&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;],&quot;PrepTime&quot;:15,&quot;Servings&quot;:4,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;}}
 
%END REM

methods.label: CreateAttachment
methods.comment:
Creates a CouchAttachment object. 
IMPORTANT NOTE: The newly created CouchAttachment object exists only in memory.  It must be uploaded using CouchAttachment.Upload() method in order to be saved to the Couch Database.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Dim attachment As CouchAttachment 
Dim uploadedbytes As Long
 
Set attachment = document.createAttachment(&quot;watermelonsalad.png&quot;, CurDir() &amp; &quot;/resources/watermelonsalad.png&quot;, &quot;image/png&quot;)
Print |Created Attachment|
Print |attachment.Name: | &amp; attachment.Name 
Print |attachment.ContentLength: | &amp; attachment.ContentLength 
Print |attachment.ContentType: | &amp; attachment.ContentType 
Print |attachment.DiskFile: | &amp; attachment.DiskFile 
Print ||        
Print |Attachment Added but Not Yet Uploaded|
Print |document.JSONValue: | &amp; document.JSONValue        
Print || 
 
&apos; !! Document must be saved to disk before uploading attachments !! 
If Not document.isSaved Then Call document.Save() 
 
uploadedbytes = attachment.Upload()
Print |attachment.Upload() returned | &amp; uploadedbytes &amp; | bytes.|
methods.argumentsuffix: (Name As String, DiskFile As String, ContentType As String)
methods.signature: Function CreateAttachment(Name As String, DiskFile As String, ContentType As String) As CouchAttachment
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Creates a CouchAttachment object. <br />IMPORTANT NOTE: The newly created CouchAttachment object exists only in memory.  It must be uploaded using CouchAttachment.Upload() method in order to be saved to the Couch Database.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

Document must be saved to disk before uploading attachments !! <br />If Not document.isSaved Then Call document.Save() <br /> <br />uploadedbytes = attachment.Upload()<br />Print |attachment.Upload() returned | &amp; uploadedbytes &amp; | bytes.|

methods.label: GetAttachmentInfo
methods.comment: Retrieves the named CouchAttachment object from the CouchDocument
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Dim attachment As CouchAttachment 
Dim uploadedbytes As Long
 
Set attachment = document.getAttachmentInfo(|watermelonsalad.png|) 
Print |Retrieved Attachment|
Print |attachment.Name: | &amp; attachment.Name 
Print |attachment.ContentLength: | &amp; attachment.ContentLength 
Print |attachment.ContentType: | &amp; attachment.ContentType 
Print ||

methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br /> <br />Dim attachment As CouchAttachment <br />Dim uploadedbytes As Long<br /> <br />Set attachment = document.getAttachmentInfo(|watermelonsalad.png|) <br />Print |Retrieved Attachment|<br />Print |attachment.Name: | &amp; attachment.Name <br />Print |attachment.ContentLength: | &amp; attachment.ContentLength <br />Print |attachment.ContentType: | &amp; attachment.ContentType <br />Print ||

methods.label: GetAttachmentNames
methods.comment: Gets the names of all CouchAttachments of a CouchDocument.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Dim elements As Variant 
Dim i As Integer
 
elements = document.getAttachmentNames() 
i = Ubound(elements) - Lbound(elements)
If (Len(FullTrim(elements(i))) &gt; 0) Then i++ 
Print |document.getAttachmentNames() returned | &amp; i &amp; | elements: |, join(elem

methods.label: Save
methods.comment:
Saves a CouchDocument to the backing Apache Couch DB database. 
Returns True if successful.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object  
 
Dim result as Boolean 
 
result = document.Save() 
&apos; OR 
Call document.Save()
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Saves a CouchDocument to the backing Apache Couch DB database. <br />Returns True if successful. </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

Returns True if successful.

methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br /> <br />Print |document.ID: | &amp; document.ID

methods.label: IsModified
methods.comment:
Flag Indicating whether or not the in-memory CouchDocument has been modified since last saved. 
 
Behavior Notes:  
1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return False. 
3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return False. 
4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return True.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Print |document.isModified: | &amp; document.isModified
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Flag Indicating whether or not the in-memory CouchDocument has been modified since last saved. <br /> <br />Behavior Notes:  <br />1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return False. <br />3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return False. <br />4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return True.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Flag Indicating whether or not the in-memory CouchDocument has been modified since last saved. <br /> <br />Behavior Notes:  <br />1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return False. <br />3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return False. <br />4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return True.
methods.inlinecomment:
' Flag Indicating whether or not the in-memory CouchDocument has been modified since last saved. 
 
Behavior Notes:  
1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return False. 
3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return False. 
4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return True.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br /> <br />Print |document.isModified: | &amp; document.isModified

methods.label: IsSaved
methods.comment:
Flag indicating if an in-memory CouchDocument has been saved since last modified.  
  
Behavior Notes:  
1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return True. 
3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return True. 
4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return False.
methods.codesample:
&apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object 
 
Print |document.isSaved: | &amp; document.isSaved
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Flag indicating if an in-memory CouchDocument has been saved since last modified.  <br />  <br />Behavior Notes:  <br />1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return True. <br />3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return True. <br />4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return False.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Flag indicating if an in-memory CouchDocument has been saved since last modified.  <br />  <br />Behavior Notes:  <br />1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return True. <br />3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return True. <br />4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return False.
methods.inlinecomment:
' Flag indicating if an in-memory CouchDocument has been saved since last modified.  
  
Behavior Notes:  
1) This will always return False for Newly created and not-yet-saved CouchDocument objects. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved (or newly retrieved from disk) and a CouchAttachment is added, this will return True. 
3) If a CouchAttachment has been uploaded to a CouchDocument , this will return True. 
4) If a new item is added to a CouchDocument, this will return False.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br /> <br />Print |document.isSaved: | &amp; document.isSaved

methods.label: JSONValue
methods.comment: JSON String containing information about the CouchDocument.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>JSON String containing information about the CouchDocument. </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: JSON String containing information about the CouchDocument.
methods.inlinecomment: ' JSON String containing information about the CouchDocument.
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created server as CouchServer and database as CouchDatabase objects<br /> <br />Dim document As CouchDocument <br />Dim id As String <br />Dim json As String <br /> <br />id = server.getUUID() &apos; For this example, assume server.getUUID() returned &quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d300a38a&quot;<br />json = |{<br />		&quot;recipe&quot;: {<br />			&quot;name&quot;: &quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;,<br />			&quot;PrepTime&quot;: 15,<br />			&quot;CookTime&quot;: 5,<br />			&quot;Servings&quot;: 4,<br />			&quot;Difficulty&quot;: &quot;&quot;,<br />			&quot;Ingredients&quot;: [<br />				&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,<br />				&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,<br />				&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,<br />				&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,<br />				&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;<br />			],<br />			&quot;Directions&quot;: [<br />				&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,<br />				&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,<br />				&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,<br />				&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;<br />			]<br />		}<br />	}|<br /> <br />Set document = database.createDocument(id, json) <br />Call document.Save() <br />Print document.JSONValue<br /> <br />%REM Prints<br />  {&quot;$$Meta$$&quot;:{&quot;$LastModified&quot;:&quot;2023-09-23T13:05:26Z&quot;},&quot;_id&quot;:&quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d300a38a&quot;,&quot;_rev&quot;:&quot;1-4134b4b21a14e6718782af9466ad32c3&quot;,&quot;recipe&quot;:{&quot;CookTime&quot;:5,&quot;Difficulty&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;Directions&quot;:[&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;],&quot;Ingredients&quot;:[&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;],&quot;PrepTime&quot;:15,&quot;Servings&quot;:4,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;}}<br /> <br />%END REM

methods.label: Revision
methods.comment:
Unique code representing the revision value of the on-disk CouchDocument . This value is composed of 2 parts delimited by a hyphen.  This value is generated by Apache CouchDB itself, and if officially &quot;opaque&quot; - other than it is unique. 
  
Behavior Notes:
1) This is not set until the CouchDocument has been saved. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved, and a CouchAttachment is added to it, this value does not change until the CouchAttachment has been Uploaded. 
3) This value will change whenever a CouchAttachment is Uploaded
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Unique code representing the revision value of the on-disk CouchDocument . This value is composed of 2 parts delimited by a hyphen.  This value is generated by Apache CouchDB itself, and if officially &quot;opaque&quot; - other than it is unique. <br />  <br />Behavior Notes:<br />1) This is not set until the CouchDocument has been saved. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved, and a CouchAttachment is added to it, this value does not change until the CouchAttachment has been Uploaded. <br />3) This value will change whenever a CouchAttachment is Uploaded</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Unique code representing the revision value of the on-disk CouchDocument . This value is composed of 2 parts delimited by a hyphen.  This value is generated by Apache CouchDB itself, and if officially &quot;opaque&quot; - other than it is unique. <br />  <br />Behavior Notes:<br />1) This is not set until the CouchDocument has been saved. <br />2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved, and a CouchAttachment is added to it, this value does not change until the CouchAttachment has been Uploaded. <br />3) This value will change whenever a CouchAttachment is Uploaded
methods.inlinecomment:
' Unique code representing the revision value of the on-disk CouchDocument . This value is composed of 2 parts delimited by a hyphen.  This value is generated by Apache CouchDB itself, and if officially &quot;opaque&quot; - other than it is unique. 
  
Behavior Notes:
1) This is not set until the CouchDocument has been saved. 
2)  If a CouchDocument has been saved, and a CouchAttachment is added to it, this value does not change until the CouchAttachment has been Uploaded. 
3) This value will change whenever a CouchAttachment is Uploaded
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM <br />  Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object, with the JSON Value of: <br />{&quot;$$Meta$$&quot;:{&quot;$LastModified&quot;:&quot;2023-09-23T13:05:26Z&quot;},&quot;_id&quot;:&quot;76796ba0df26f8c2e539cf39d300a38a&quot;,&quot;_rev&quot;:&quot;1-4134b4b21a14e6718782af9466ad32c3&quot;,&quot;recipe&quot;:{&quot;CookTime&quot;:5,&quot;Difficulty&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;Directions&quot;:[&quot;Cube 6 cups of watermelon&quot;,&quot;Stir in olive oil and lime juice&quot;,&quot;Chop, and stir in feta cheese&quot;,&quot;Garnish with fresh basil&quot;],&quot;Ingredients&quot;:[&quot;6 cups cubed watermelon&quot;,&quot;2 tbsp. olive oil&quot;,&quot;1 tbsp. lime juice&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup chopped feta cheese&quot;,&quot;1/3 cup basil leaves&quot;],&quot;PrepTime&quot;:15,&quot;Servings&quot;:4,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Watermelon Salad&quot;}}<br />%END REM <br />Print |document.Revision: | &amp; document.Revison <br />&apos; Prints &quot;document.Revision: 1-4134b4b21a14e6718782af9466ad32c3&quot;

methods.label: URL
methods.comment:
URL of the CouchDocument  
Follows the pattern 
CouchServer.URL / CouchDatabase.Name / CouchDocuent.ID
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>URL of the CouchDocument  <br />Follows the pattern <br />CouchServer.URL / CouchDatabase.Name / CouchDocuent.ID </pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: URL of the CouchDocument  <br />Follows the pattern <br />CouchServer.URL / CouchDatabase.Name / CouchDocuent.ID
methods.inlinecomment:
' URL of the CouchDocument  
Follows the pattern 
CouchServer.URL / CouchDatabase.Name / CouchDocuent.ID
methods.codesamplehtml: &apos; Sample code assumes previously created document As CouchDocument object <br />&apos; With CouchServer.URL of &quot;http://mycouchserver.mycompany.com&quot;<br />&apos; and CouchDatabase.Name of &quot;recipes&quot; <br />&apos; and CouchDocument.ID of &quot;123456&quot; <br />Print |document.URL: | &amp; document.URL <br />&apos; Prints &quot;document.URL: http://mycouchserver.mycompany.com/recipes/123456&quot;
